metadata.title: CVE-2018-4278 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In Safari before 11.1.2, iTunes before 12.8 for Windows, iOS before 11.4.1,tvOS before 11.4.1, iCloud for Windows before 7.6, sound fetched throughaudio elements may be exfiltrated cross-origin. This issue was addressedwith improved audio taint tracking.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4278` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.20.5-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
webkit2gtk package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.20.5-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
